description: Play as both Gabriel and Grace as they are dispatched to Munich to solve a series of mutilation murders thought to be the work of werewolves.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 7 Compatible DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 3200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible

reviews.review_text: Got as part of a Sierra Humble Bundle.  Just as I remember, a bit crashy (just like I remember) but works nicely through the Link. Am looking forward to subjecting the other half to a full play through.
